transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Executive: Ji good morning sir, Ujair baat kar raha hu sir IndiaMART se, kaise hain sir aap?
Customer: Baat thik hai, uske baad batao.
Executive: Ji sir, mai ye bol raha tha jo aap buylead consume kar rahe hain to waha pe aap not relevant mark kar rahe hain, right?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ji, to yaha pe thoda sa ek concern aaya hai, mai usi ke regarding aapko call kar raha tha lekin aap se call lag nahi pa rahe the.
Customer: Batao.
Executive: Ji, to waha pe aap jo BLN hai matlab not relevant mark kar rahe hain wo kaise mark kar rahe hain sir?
Customer: [inaudible] aata hai na char panch aata hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm. To waha pe aap kya karna, dekho jaise aap mark jo kar rahe hain wo apni hi category mein aap ek to kar dena. Jaise apna ye category hai garam masala.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: And spice packaging printed pouch ye apna category hai, right?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ji, to ab isme aapne wrong category mein mark kar diya to usse kya hoga hamari hi buylead deboost ho jayenge. Lekin hame kya karna hai usme specification mein jaake fir hame jis buylead mein jo issue aa raha hai wo specification dalna hoga.
Customer: Specification dal to aate jaise low order rehta hai to mai hata deta hu. [inaudible] usme specification likhne ka to hata deta hu.
Executive: Nahi nahi, yaha pe mai kuch cheeze aisi dekh raha hu jaise aapne mark kiya hai spice packaging bags mein, garam masala mein, masala powder mein.
Customer: [inaudible] wo bags hai wo masala ka bag hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm, ek minute rukiye sir line pe rahiye mai open karta hu.
Executive: Sir aapne export service le li kya waha se?
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Yes sir is ye aapne ek kya hai white label masala. Travel kar raha hu mai tumko, tum mujhe na ek kaam karo sham ko phone karna around 4 o'clock pe mai travel kar raha hu.
Executive: 4 o'clock. Haan around 4 o'clock phone karna.
Executive: Okay, thik hai mai 4 o'clock karta hu.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer marking buyleads as not relevant.

- Customer marking wrong category for buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive explained correct way to mark buyleads.

- Executive will call back at 4 o'clock.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back at 4 o'clock.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, category, specification, not relevant
